nodes.text: The Crying Room was a cellar far below Château Malreaux on the planet Vjun. It had lifelike roses and thorns carved into the wall. It was used by the Viscount's wives to bemourn their own lives.

During Yoda's mission to Vjun, the Padawans Whie Malreaux and Scout found themselves captured by Asajj Ventress in the room. She tried to turn Whie to the dark side but was unsuccessful. She was about to kill the two when they were rescued by the timely arrival of Solis.
